hero.description: Standard card: His voice is tremor, his ways are dirty, but true to his purpose.

cards.description: Standard card: He has seen everything, his mind has never been asleep since the making of the realm.
cards.name: Warden

cards.description: Standard card: A drink can always be served, with the blood of his enemies.
cards.name: Berserker

cards.description: Premium card: You shall not pass, you shall not prevail, you shall perish.
